text.intro: I am a software developer based in Bilbao, Spain.
text.goal: I created this simple web page with the goal of getting to know EmberJs better üêπ

feature-list.intro: Some of the things I wanted to practice witht this project are:
feature-list.locales: Handling more than one locale with ember-intl
feature-list.styles: Using SASS styles and CSS modules
feature-list.ember-data: Use Ember Data to communicate with Firebase
